titleStmt.title: A præfatory discourse to a late pamphlet entituled, A memento for English Protestants, &c. being an answer to that part of the Compendium which reflects upon the Bishop of Lincoln's book : together with some occasional reflections on Mr. L'Estrange's writings.
titleStmt.author: Amy, S.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, with several additions and amendments.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Dawks for the author,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to S. Amy. Cf. BM.
